snippet.title: CONVRGENCE - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
CONVRGENCE is a new game from the creator of Paradox of Hope. Explore the mysterious Chernokamensk exclusion zone with your faithful four-legged friend. Scavenge for loot, fight bandits and hunt for mystical artifacts. However be sure to return to base before duskfall, for when night arrives the hunter becomes the hunted.

Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2609610/CONVRGENCE/
And join our Discord: https://discord.gg/9t79QCHvPc

Press Kit: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1CWfNPo2IA0aJrQ2oNFn4zgXF9OVGuEj1
